column8: An intensive 48-hour hackathon focused on AI and sustainable energy solutions. Participants must build a working prototype.
column9: 1. No pre-written code allowed. 2. Maximum team size is 4. 3. Must use at least one Open Source API.

column8: A high-stakes business case competition where students analyze real-world market data to propose a 5-year growth strategy.
column9: 1. Submissions must be in PDF format. 2. All data sources must be cited. 3. Late submissions will not be judged.
column10: 1st Place: Internship at GlobalCorp; 2nd Place: $1500; 3rd Place: Tech Gadget Bundle
